      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A látás</string>
            <string language="en-US">Visual Perception</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtvorstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perception Visuelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Percepção Visual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percezione Visiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτική αντίληψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Opinión Visual</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A szem felépítése és működése - alkalmazkodás a távolsághoz; a fényérzékelés mechanizmusa, a könnyképződés; gyakori látáshibák</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Structure and Functioning of Eyes - Adaptation to Distance; Mechanism of Light Sensation, Tear Generation, Frequent Sight Defects</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">érzékelés</string>
            <string language="en-US">sense</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">érzőműködés</string>
            <string language="en-US">sense functioning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">szem</string>
            <string language="en-US">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fényérzékelés</string>
            <string language="en-US">sense of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Struktur und das Arbeiten der Augen - 
Anpassung an Abstand; Einheit der hellen Empfindung, 
Riss-Erzeugung, frequentieren Anblick-Defekte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure et le fonctionnement des yeux - 
adaptation à la distance ; Le mécanisme de la sensation 
légère, génération de larme, fréquentent des défauts de vue</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura e funcionar dos olhos - adaptação 
à distância; O mecanismo do sensation claro, geração do 
rasgo, freqüenta defeitos da vista</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura ed il funzionamento degli occhi - 
adattamento alla distanza; Il meccanismo della sensazione 
chiara, generazione della rottura, frequenta i difetti di vista</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δομή και η λειτουργία των ματιών - προσαρμογή στην 
απόσταση  Μηχανισμός της ελαφριάς αίσθησης, παραγωγή 
δακρύων, συχνές ατέλειες όρασης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura y el funcionamiento de ojos - 
adaptación a la distancia; El mecanismo de la sensación 
ligera, generación del rasgón, frecuenta defectos de la vista</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
